title: Soil application of graphitic carbon nitride nanosheets alleviate cadmium toxicity by altering subcellular distribution, chemical forms of cadmium and improving nitrogen availability in soybean (Glycine max L.)
content:

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 368

Author(s): Kai Xu, Lifan Zheng, Kaifei Chu, Chenghua Xing, Jiajing Shu, Keming Fang, Shuting Ma, Yong Fang, Jianfang Yan, Miaozhen Cai, Xi-Lin Wu
